All Classes and Interfaces

Class
Description
App
Entry point of the application.
Bus
A class representing a Bus, which is a type of Vehicle.
Car
A class representing a Car, which is a type of Vehicle.
Car
A class representing a car that has an engine.
Circle
A class representing a circle, which is a two-dimensional shape with all points on the boundary equidistant from the center.
Cube
A class representing a cube, which is a three-dimensional shape with all sides equal.
DieselEngine
A class representing a diesel engine, which is a type of engine.
Employee
Represents an Employee with basic information such as name, date of birth, and base salary.
Engine
An abstract class representing an engine.
PetrolEngine
A class representing a petrol engine, which is a type of engine.
Rectangle
A class representing a rectangle, which is a two-dimensional shape with opposite sides that are equal in length and all angles are right angles.
SalaryCalculator
A utility class for calculating net salary based on the base salary and tax rate.
Shape
An interface representing a geometric shape.
SpeedCalculation
A utility class for calculating allowed speed of the vehicle.
Square
A class representing a square, which is a special type of rectangle where all sides are equal in length.
ThreeDShape
An interface representing a three-dimensional geometric shape.
TwoDShape
An interface representing a two-dimensional geometric shape.
Vehicle
An abstract class representing a vehicle with a maximum speed.
